name: Gum-Gum Quattro Mano Jet Cross Shock Bazooka

trigger.text: KO up to one of your opponent's rested cost 4 or lower characters.

text: If your leader has the <<Odyssey>> type and you have two or more rested characters in play, up to one of your leader or characters gains +2000 power for this turn.
